title: America Outdoors with Baratunde Thurston
overview: Follow Baratunde Thurston, bestselling author and podcaster, as he explores the country's diverse landscapes to see how they shape the way we work, play and interact with the outdoors. From coal miners turned beekeepers in Appalachia to Black surfers catching waves in L.A., uncover a deeper understanding of our passionate and complex relationship with the natural world.
